title: Preparation and characterization of a ciprofloxacin-loaded nanoparticles incorporated polymeric film dressing
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27520-27529
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02951H, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Omar A. Alsaidan, Naveed Ahmad, Hasan Ejaz, Muhammad Ajaz Hussain, Ameeduzzafar Zafar, Hassan H. Alhassan
Antibiotic (ciprofloxacin)-loaded sodium alginate (SA)–chitosan (CS) nanoparticles (NPs) were incorporated into novel arabinoxylan (AX)–pectin (PC) polymeric films and characterized for application in wound dressing.
